title: Unlocking the Secrets to Successful Tokenomics: An Interview with Matty, Token Economics Lead at Status.im and Logos
description: DeFi, a once-flourishing bastion of financial innovation, is experiencing turbulent times. According to BanklessTimes, an alarming 10% of the market is saturated with fraudulent tokens, which partially explains the prevailing climate of skepticism and distrust.

title: Fourth Consecutive Week of Decline: NFT Sales Dip 6.75%
description: Non-fungible token (NFT) sales took yet another dip this week, marking the fourth consecutive week of decline, albeit a slight one, with a decrease of 6.75%. From September 2, 2023, to September 9, the total sales for this week amounted to approximately $80.69 million, with a notable chunk of $42.61 million originating from the Ethereum […]

title: Ripple’s legal team and SEC engage in war of words over lawsuit tactics
description: Stuart Alderoty, Ripple’s Chief Legal Officer, has labeled the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) latest court filing as a “hypocritical pivot,” escalating tensions in the ongoing legal battle between the two entities. Alderoty took to social media to criticize the SEC’s recent submission, which aimed to reinforce its interlocutory appeal.  He pointed out what ... Read more

title: Litecoin Price Prediction for September: Experts Are Convinced This New Hybrid Meme Coin is a Better Alternative
description: As the price of Litecoin continues to plummet, LTC investors are starting to panic and look for more profitable alternatives. Market sentiments are showing that there’s a high probability the price of the Litecoin token will reach a new low in September.
